main event: Observers noted a round and bright object moving erratically in the sky on 26 July 1964.
interesting points: The sighting occurred for about 5 minutes at 20:30 hrs., The observers felt the object was not a normal aircraft or balloon, The object changed direction and speed erratically, An initial conclusion was that the object could possibly be a satellite, No photographs were present in the report.
sighted object: a round and bright object in the sky
